name: Zombler X
description:
Zimbler is the game that I have created for Mini-Jam 102. In the game, you start playing as a human and must shoot zombies that are spawning around the map. When your health reaches 0 however the player does but the game doesn't end. you turn into a zombie and can continue to play but instead of against zombies, you're against humans. Your primary objective is to see how many zombie heads (collected when fighting zombies) and human brains (collected when fighting humans) you can collect before you lose by finally dying (after reaching zero health as a zombie).

Going to play the game or have already played the game? 

If you don't mind I have created a google form for feedback. If you play the game please consider filling in the form, it could really help me learn how I could improve for future projects (other than things I already know)

Google Form: https://forms.gle/rZb2r45wnsrdnabw7

How to Play / Controls

- WASD or Arrow keys to move

- Space to shoot/throw a rock (while a human)

-Rocks shoot towards the mouse (cursor) position

- Collide with survivors while your a zombie to kill them

-Avoid rocks being thrown at you by survivors when you're a zombie

- Kill zombies by throwing rocks at them when your human

-the total collected zombie heads and brains you collect by the end is your score
